Description:
DESIGNER HOME OUTSTANDING LOCATION
This property has been designed by an award winning local architect with one of the best names in the industry.
Set in the pristine Shearwater estate with over 5 hectares of wetlands and parklands. Enjoy the dynamic combination of open spaces, natural environment complete with a thriving ecosystem and bustling wildlife.
Shearwater is located next to the Phillip Island Golf course, just a short drive to Cowes and 700m from Silverleaves beach.
This home was built to encompass the northern ambient sun that flows into the central open plan living/kitchen/dining.
This grand space is designed with high raked ceilings, hardwood timber floors large sliding doors overlooking the native gardens and semi alfresco decked area.
The premium kitchen is cleverly designed with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, large pot draws, glass window-splash back and an integrated butler's pantry.
Across the home, find a private study, 4 generous sized bedrooms complete with BIR's, Master room offers views over the native gardens, spacious walk in robe and a modern private ensuite.
The home is positioned well to allow side access to the large shed great for storing a boat or trailer and access to a private back yard perfect for a large vegetable garden.
Book your inspection today and see what this beautiful home has to offer.
Insights: 9 SANCTUARY DRIVE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
The Perfect Entertainer
This 2 year old single level modern family home, located in the increasingly popular and family friendly Whysteands Estate that has an established park and playground for children, this property is only a few minutes drive to the Cowes shopping precinct and a 10 minute walk to the beach through the fire track.
Comprising spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area. There are three bedrooms, master complete with WIR and Ensuite along with an additional bathroom with separate powder room.
Double sliding doors lead out to the decked alfresco area, with the sound of the water feature inviting you outside, separate fire pit area for those summer nights with concreted area for the outdoor dining.
Additional features include split system heating and cooling, wood fire, timber flooring and carpet floors throughout, double garage with side access to rear yard. Garden shed and separate wood shed.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
BRAND NEW & READY TO MOVE IN!
This stunning home is a perfect example of clever design and has style, flair and with a great outdoor entertaining area perfect for any occasion. This home would be perfect for a young family, investor or downsizer looking to make the sea change to Phillip Island, offering 3 bedrooms including a Master bedroom with ensuite, large walk in robe and private Courtyard with a timeless water feature. The overall layout of the house offers fantastic spacious to accommodate all your needs.
From the moment you enter the home you will notice the house has been designed for easy living. An open plan lounge and kitchen area leads through to a generous outdoor entertaining area. The large kitchen area has top of the range appliances and a generous walk in pantry.
Features:-
- Master bedroom with ensuite, WIR & private courtyard
- 2nd and 3rd bedroom with floor to ceiling built in robes
- 900mm Stainless Steel Oven / Gas Cooktop/ Bosch dishwasher
- Caesar stone bench tops to kitchen
- Fully Landscaped front and year yard
- Water feature with Lighting
- Fully Fenced yard with gates both sides
- Automatic panel lift door with remote control
- 2 Split system Heating and cooling
- Side parking for Oversized caravan or Boat as well as off-street parking at front
- Powder room with vanity
- NBN connection already done - FTTH modem included
- Hard wearing laminate Timber floor through living areas
Located in the quiet street of Grampian Blvd in Whyte Sands, this property is close to all amenities, local shops and the popular Cowes pier. Walking/bike path offers easy access to your pick of beautiful north-facing bay beaches - Red Rocks beach, Justice Rd beach or Anderson Rd jetty…
Be sure to inspect today as this beautiful home won't last long.

Description:
NEW HOME PRICED TO SELL
Located along a quiet road within Whytesands this new home offers big living at an affordable price.
This custom-built home is positioned to take in the North facing warmth, offering spacious open plan living kitchen & dining complete with raked ceilings and beautiful gable windows.
In addition the 2 large bedrooms with built in robes, Spacious family bathroom with separate toilet. and the master bed room has a private ensuite and walk in robe.
With a fantastic allotment of 501m2 and double carport there is plenty of room for the boat caravan or trailer.
Whytesands offers you piece of mind with all available services connected and parts and activities.
Call now to arrange your inspection as this home is priced to sell!

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Location Location. We hear it all the time. Why? Because it pays to be in the right position. If you're looking for a fabulous property to holiday in, and also provide a holiday rental return, look no further. Being sold as walk in walk out, this beautifully furnished townhouse has it all. Ground floor, double garage with secure entry, a ground floor living space, double bedroom, separate bathroom and under stair storage and entry to a rear courtyard with no maintenance mod grass lawn. Upstairs a spacious light filled open plan living space and kitchen, two more double bedrooms with built in robes, a second bathroom and upstairs deck for the barbeque and outdoor setting. With all of the furniture included in your purchase price, this won't last long. Inspection will confirm.

Description:
GOLF COURSE VIEWS TITLED AND READY TO BUILD
A building allotment of approx 448m2 with great views overlooking the back nine of the Cowes golf Course. This level allotment is ready to build on in the NEW SHEARWATER ESTATE, which promises to be a great place to live with spectacular wetlands area, boardwalks and walking tracks. The estate is centrally located to the Phillip Island golf course, with the front nine at your doorstep and the back nine running along the length of the estate. Silverleaves Beach is only a short walk (700m approx) away, with the Heath lands of Rhyll and walking track just a short distance in the opposite direction. This is an exciting new estate with plenty to offer the families and holiday residents.

Description:
A rare opportunity!
Nestled in a highly sought after pocket of Cowes is this double storey townhouse, only 200m (approx) from the pristine Cowes bay beach, Erewhon point, Lovers walk and minutes walk to all Thompson Avenue has to offer.
Downstairs comprises an open plan kitchen, living and dining area which leads out onto a private outdoor entertainment area which captures the morning sun. Also on this level is a laundry and bathroom with separate toilet.
The upper level offers two generous sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe, central bathroom and balcony.
Additional features include split system heating and cooling, polished timber floors throughout, dishwasher and single car remote control garage.
Set on a 143sqm approx allotment with low maintenance surrounds and with a reliable tenant in place this property would best suit those looking to invest.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Set on a 621 sqm approx fully fenced allotment with low maintenance surrounds that includes a kids playground, garden shed and entertaining deck. With a little bit of TLC this property will not last long, inspection is a must!

READY FOR YOU TO MOVE IN AND ENJOY
This new home will suit those wanting a new home but with all of the hard work done. The home features 4 bedrooms, master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, two spacious living areas that combines with a big open plan kitchen and living area. A covered patio with tracked roller clear blinds and room to get a boat or van up the side of the home.
North facing back yard, fully fenced, Double garage with secure entry Into the home, ready set go.

Description:
TITLED AND READY TO BUILD
A great building allotment of approx 519m2 with a slight rise to the back of the block, Build a new home and take advantage of the location and position just near the Shearwater lake.
The SHEARWATER estate, is a great place to live with spectacular wetlands area, boardwalks and walking tracks. The estate is centrally located to the Phillip Island golf course, with the front nine at your doorstep and the back nine running along the length of the estate. Silverleaves Beach is only a short walk (700m approx) away, with the Heath lands of Rhyll and walking track just a short distance in the opposite direction. This is an exciting new estate with plenty to offer the families and holiday residents.
Insights: 20 WATERFORD DRIVE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
CONTEMPORARY COASTAL LIVING
Supremely positioned close to the heart of Cowes this townhouse offers an enticing package for the discerning buyer. Offering a vast array of quality features and a contemporary décor this property promises to be your ideal Island destination.
Offering 3 spacious bedrooms, the master with full en-suite and a main bathroom with bath. Laminate floorboards tastefully cover the open plan living and dining that includes a modern and well-appointed kitchen. For further convenience and comfort the property has two reverse cycle heating and cooling systems, upstairs and down, a single lock-up garage, private courtyard with low maintenance native landscaped gardens.
Potentially a fabulous investment in the form of permanent or holiday letting, this home also offers an excellent opportunity for low maintenance permanent living with a walk in walk out agreement. Your inspection is warmly invited.
Insights: 6/230 Settlement Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Sunny Spacious and Secure
This architect designed 2 bedroom villa is situated in Cowes as part of the Seagrove Estate, close to the shopping precinct, and a 10 minute walk to the bay beach.
The open plan modern spaces are complemented by neutral decor, and high ceilings. The large master suite has a walk in robe, and a dual access ensuite/bathroom with separate powder room. The second bedroom is complete with built in robes.
A bright spacious kitchen boasts a glass splash back, stainless steel electric wall oven and cook top, and a single door dishwasher. The living area opens up onto a private under cover north facing entertaining area.
Other features include:- Single remote garage with both internal and rear access, ducted split system heating and cooling.
With timber flooring, tiles and quality finishings throughout the home, you can move straight in with nothing to do!
Phone today to arrange an inspection.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 2/60 McKenzie Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2017 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.
